name: ghdoc-mcp-app
description: GitHub style Markdown preview MCP App

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --packages=external --outfile=dist/server.js && esbuild main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --packages=external --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.start:http: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve:http
scripts.start:stdio: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve:stdio
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve:http'
